sentence.text: The mutational analysis of the whole mitochondrial DNA revealed the presence of m.1555AAAAAG mutation in MT-RNR1 gene associated to the m.8527AAAAAG (p.MAAAAV) and the m.8392CAAAAT (p.136PAAAAS) variations in the mitochondrial MT-ATP6 gene in patient1 and his family members with variable phenotype including hearing impairment.
